metadata.title: IBeanThere
metadata.description: Discover local cafes, log your coffee visits, and share your experiences

browser_guide.title: How to Enable Location
browser_guide.chrome_step1: Click the <icon>info</icon> icon next to the URL
browser_guide.safari_step1: Go to Safari Settings > Websites > Location
browser_guide.firefox_step1: Click the permission icon in address bar
browser_guide.edge_step1: Click the lock icon ðŸ”’ in the address bar

profile.title: My Profile

shop.hero_subtitle_line1: A subtle signal only people who truly love coffee and cafes

essentials.title: Cafe Nomad Essentials
essentials.subtitle: Practical items for those who work and relax in cafes.

explorer.title: Explorer & Collector
explorer.subtitle: Items that foster a sense of belonging, linked to the Founding Crew system.

gift.title: Gift Packages
gift.subtitle: Perfect compositions for gifting to friends.

tumbler.title: Sleek Reusable Tumbler
tumbler.desc: Minimalist design with matte black/white base. Leak-proof for your bag.

pouch.title: Laptop/iPad Pouch
pouch.desc: Water-resistant material strong against coffee stains. 'Work from Cafe' design.

ecobag.title: Tyvek Eco Bag
ecobag.desc: Lightweight and durable Tyvek material. Kraft paper texture with logo point.

keyring.title: Map Marker Keyring
keyring.desc: Map pin shaped keyring. Show off your Navigator/Vanguard status.

passport.title: Cafe Passport Note
passport.desc: Analog note for stamps and stickers. Record your journey physically.

stickers.title: Removable Sticker Pack
stickers.desc: Decorate your laptop and tumbler. 'Verified Cafe', 'Coffee Lover' graphics.

hoodie.title: Heavyweight Hoodie
hoodie.desc: Comfortable fit for cafe hopping. 'Support Your Local Cafe' slogan on back.

cap.title: Vintage Ball Cap
cap.desc: Deep fit cap with coffee bean embroidery. Washed vintage color.

dripbag.title: IBeanThere Selection Drip Bag
dripbag.desc: Curated drip bags from top-rated roasteries on the platform.

coaster.title: Map Coaster
coaster.desc: Diatomaceous earth or leather. Map design that completes with a cup.

community.title: Community
community.subtitle: See what your Taste Mates are discovering
community.login_required_description: Sign in to see logs from your Taste Mates and discover new cafes.
community.no_taste_mates_hint: Trust users whose coffee taste you like to see their logs here!
community.feed_empty: No logs from your Taste Mates yet
community.feed_empty_hint: Start trusting more users to see their coffee discoveries!
community.badge_gallery_description: Collect badges as you explore new cafes and share your coffee journey. Can you collect them all?
community.all_badges_earned: Congratulations! You've earned all available badges!

legal.disclaimer_translation: This translation is provided for convenience only. In case of any discrepancy between this version and the English version, the English version shall prevail.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to IBeanThere. By accessing or using our mobile application and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

account.title: 2. User Accounts
account.content: To access certain features, you must create an account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information. You are strictly responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

content.title: 3. User Content
content.content: Our service allows you to post reviews, photos, and other content. You retain ownership of your content, but you grant IBeanThere a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, copy, reproduce, process, adapt, modify, publish, transmit, display, and distribute any such content.

conduct.title: 4. Acceptable Use
conduct.content: You agree not to modify, reverse engineer, or create derivative works of our service. You must not post content that is illegal, abusive, harassing, or violates any third-party rights.

location.title: 5. Location Services
location.content: Some features of our app require access to your device's location. You can control these permissions through your device settings. We use location data to provide local cafe recommendations.

termination.title: 6. Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your access to the service at any time, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties, or for any other reason.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, IBeanThere shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

governing_law.title: 8. Governing Law
governing_law.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Canada and the province of British Columbia, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@ibeanthere.app.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: IBeanThere ("we," "our," or "us") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application.

sections.personal: Personal Information: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, and profile information when you register.
sections.location: Location Data: With your consent, we collect precise geolocation data to show you nearby cafes and verify check-ins.
sections.usage: Usage Data: We automatically collect information about how you interact with our services, including log data, device information, and interactions with content.

use.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services, personalize your experience, process your requests, and communicate with you. We process your data based on your consent and our legitimate business interests.

sharing.title: 4. Disclosure of Information
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with third-party service providers who help us operate our services (e.g., cloud hosting, analytics), subject to confidentiality obligations.

retention.title: 5. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which we collected it, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.

security.title: 6. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

rights.title: 7. Your Rights (GDPR & PIPEDA)
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information, as well as the right to restrict or object to certain processing. To exercise these rights, please contact us.

international.title: 8. International Transfers
international.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence, where data protection laws may differ. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact our Data Privacy Officer at privacy@ibeanthere.app.
